text: <a href="../2-Chronicles-4-1/" title="2 Chronicles 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Moreover he made an altar of brass, twenty cubits the length thereof, and twenty cubits the breadth thereof, and ten cubits the height thereof.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-2/" title="2 Chronicles 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Also he made a molten sea of ten cubits from brim to brim, round in compass, and five cubits the height thereof; and a line of thirty cubits did compass it round about.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-3/" title="2 Chronicles 4:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And under it *was* the similitude of oxen, which did compass it round about: ten in a cubit, compassing the sea round about. Two rows of oxen *were* cast, when it was cast.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-4/" title="2 Chronicles 4:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 It stood upon twelve oxen, three looking toward the north, and three looking toward the west, and three looking toward the south, and three looking toward the east: and the sea *was set* above upon them, and all their hinder parts *were* inward.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-5/" title="2 Chronicles 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And the thickness of it *was* an handbreadth, and the brim of it like the work of the brim of a cup, with flowers of lilies; *and* it received and held three thousand baths.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-6/" title="2 Chronicles 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 He made also ten lavers, and put five on the right hand, and five on the left, to wash in them: such things as they offered for the burnt offering they washed in them; but the sea *was* for the priests to wash in.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-7/" title="2 Chronicles 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And he made ten candlesticks of gold according to their form, and set *them* in the temple, five on the right hand, and five on the left.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-8/" title="2 Chronicles 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 He made also ten tables, and placed *them* in the temple, five on the right side, and five on the left. And he made an hundred basons of gold.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-9/" title="2 Chronicles 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 Furthermore he made the court of the priests, and the great court, and doors for the court, and overlaid the doors of them with brass.
<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-10/" title="2 Chronicles 4:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And he set the sea on the right side of the east end, over against the south.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-11/" title="2 Chronicles 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And Huram made the pots, and the shovels, and the basons. And Huram finished the work that he was to make for king Solomon for the house of God;

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-12/" title="2 Chronicles 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 *To wit*, the two pillars, and the pommels, and the chapiters *which were* on the top of the two pillars, and the two wreaths to cover the two pommels of the chapiters which *were* on the top of the pillars;

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-13/" title="2 Chronicles 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And four hundred pomegranates on the two wreaths; two rows of pomegranates on each wreath, to cover the two pommels of the chapiters which *were* upon the pillars.
<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-14/" title="2 Chronicles 4:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 He made also bases, and lavers made he upon the bases;
<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-15/" title="2 Chronicles 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 One sea, and twelve oxen under it.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-16/" title="2 Chronicles 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 The pots also, and the shovels, and the fleshhooks, and all their instruments, did Huram his father make to king Solomon for the house of the LORD of bright brass.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-17/" title="2 Chronicles 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 In the plain of Jordan did the king cast them, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zeredathah.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-18/" title="2 Chronicles 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Thus Solomon made all these vessels in great abundance: for the weight of the brass could not be found out.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-19/" title="2 Chronicles 4:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And Solomon made all the vessels that *were for* the house of God, the golden altar also, and the tables whereon the shewbread *was set*;

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-20/" title="2 Chronicles 4:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 Moreover the candlesticks with their lamps, that they should burn after the manner before the oracle, of pure gold;

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-21/" title="2 Chronicles 4:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, *made he of* gold, *and* that perfect gold;

<a href="../2-Chronicles-4-22/" title="2 Chronicles 4:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And the snuffers, and the basons, and the spoons, and the censers, *of* pure gold: and the entry of the house, the inner doors thereof for the most holy *place*, and the doors of the house of the temple, *were of* gold.
